column4: Anyone know if there is anything like "system-config-display" on Fedora for Ubuntu? Something I could use for quickly changing modes when I plug my laptop to a monitor
ctrl alt +/-  will change the resolution
It stays the same if the graph card can handle it?
well I have an extra app installed on my taskbar that does both
dont laugh its called "resize and rotate"
You have an URL for it or is it availagle through Synaptic?
I dont think its on synaptic trying to remember were I got it
its created by a SuSE programmer for kde
Cheers, I'll try looking for that.
Ive used it in gnome though
